title: Advanced Networking Instructional Design Based on Packet Tracer

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding TCP/IP protocols, basic network topology design, and packet analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Methodology Training for Pre-Service Teachers on Teaching Advanced Networking Concepts Using Simulation Tools

learning_goals: Learners can design complex network topologies with three or more layers using Packet Tracer
Learners can visually analyze and explain the operational principles of routing protocols (OSPF, EIGRP) in simulated environments
Based on simulation results, it is possible to propose network failure diagnosis and optimization strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
